MouseEvent.altKey

The MouseEvent.altKey read-only property is a Boolean indicates if the alt key was pressed (true) or not (false) when the event occurred.

Syntax

var altKeyPressed = instanceOfMouseEvent.altKey

Examples

<html>
<head>
<title>altKey example</title>

<script type="text/javascript">
document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
Â  console.log('Is Alt/Option key pressed?', e.altKey);
})
</script>
</head>

<body>
<p>
Click anywhere on the page and open your developer console to see the results.
</p>
</body>
</html>
